name: 2 Bee Or Not 2 Bee (Destruct'Oeuf)
description:
You can use the button "H" to mute the game

Use WASD or arrows to move

The theme of the game jam being"two",we decided to make a game where only one controller controls the two characters. This add difficulty compared to a classic controll mode, due to the fact that you must be focused on your two bees at the same time.

The goal of the game is the re-aquire the honey dispached on each map. But you must be carefull because of the deadly bug-killer.

We're a little group french high-scholler who love video games and always dream to create some.We're absolute beginner, nobody in our team ever have finished a "real" game. Nobody had a lot exprience in the role he fulfied. We had to learn/re-learn the basics and "reinvent the wheel" for a lot of very simple things.

Assets from the internet:

-typeface : https://www.fontspace.com/summerbee-font-f46710

-typeface: https://www.dafont.com/fr/minecrafter.font

-icons: https://www.freepng.fr/
